name: truckle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cheese, especially cheddar cheese, in the shape of a short cylinder: Small truckles of cheese make excellent gifts. A piece of Cheddar with the rind on shows that the cheese has been cut from a truckle and not from a block.
the wooden or plastic container in which cheese is shaped into a cylinder: Salt is then added to the curds before they are packed into muslin-lined truckles or moulds. See also
truckle bed
More examplesFewer examplesWe can supply small quantities of cheese or an entire truckle.The truckles are lightly pressed for 24 hours, and then they are turned and pressed more firmly for a further 24 hour period. The wooden truckles have been replaced with pvc equivalents in order to conform to current health standard requirements.
